motd_list.title: Birthday event is over!
motd_list.description: Thank you all for playing the birthday event! We hope you had a blast and we are working on more events and updates for the future!

motd_list.title: New event and Twitch stream soon!
motd_list.description: Mark your calendar! Always_LagginTV is hosting a 4/20 celebration stream on Twitch and TikTok on April 20th at 4:20 PM EST! Join us for some fun and appear on stream for the release of the Easter Event!

motd_list.title: New easter event soon!
motd_list.description: The Easter event will start soon! Earn Double XP, enjoy all maps being overhauled and unlock a free limited time cosmetic by completing a challenge!
